thread.title: Patriot Coal Wins Court Approval of Plan to Hand Over Mines
thread.title_full: Patriot Coal Wins Court Approval of Plan to Hand Over Mines - WSJ

author: Jacqueline Palank
title: Patriot Coal Wins Court Approval of Plan to Hand Over Mines
text:
Patriot Coal Corp. on Thursday won confirmation of its chapter 11 debt repayment plan, clearing the way for the company to hand over its mines to new owners in an effort to preserve the business amid widespread distress in the coal industry.
Judge Keith Phillips of the U.S. Bankruptcy Court in Richmond, Va., said he would approve Patriot’s chapter 11 plan as a “largely consensual plan and the result of extensive, comprehensive...
